text: Xinshi zhishi xinyang zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de ren; dang tamen wei renhe yao shi er yu shizhe jihui de shihou, tamen bu tuixi, zhidao tamen xiang ta qingqiu yunxu. Xiang ni qingshi zhe, que shi xinyang zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de. Dang tamen yin sishi er xiang ni qingshi de shihou, ni keyi yunxu ni suo yiyu zhe, ni dang wei tamen xiang zhenzhu qiurao. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
